DOC.brief_summary: This study is investigating how patients with severe stable state COPD perceive the variability of their symptoms throughout the day, the week and the year; the impact of these variations on their daily activities or sleep quality and how they deal with their treatments. For this purpose patients will be asked to answer a questionnaire over the phone
DOC.brief_title: European Non-interventional Study in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
DOC.criteria: Outpatients with a diagnosis of COPD FEV1<50% and FEV1/FVC<0.7 according to lung function data in medical records. Smoker or exsmoker > 10 packyears Informed consent obtained Ongoing exacerbation of COPD or within the previous 3 months Any other significant respiratory disease (including asthma and allergic rhinitis)
